Posts.Content: Jan 8, 2010 10:24AM DKNK22 wrote: 30, Stage 4 from beginning. First doc told me the swelling in my breast was nothing more than a mild infection, no sono necessary. She joked and told me not to let my husband bite my boob for a while. She made me feel like a hypochondriac. a few months later when the breast grew my husband got freaked out so I went to a breast surgeon, who also told me it's probably nothing & she wouldn't even prescribe antibiotics for it, but at least she sent me for a sono/mamo, which led to a biop...etc. I can't imagine how many other diagnosis that first doctor missed. Hope she chokes on her retirement!
Posts.Title: Poll - How old were you when dx with BC Times3 Minetta57
